heading: Central Programs Staff
description: We added the number of full time equivalent (FTE) staff employed by each central program. This is a measure of hours worked rather than people. 1 FTE = 40 hours worked. For this reason, you might see fractions in the totals. For example, 2 people working on a program for 20 hours each week is equivalent to 1 FTE even though 2 people work on the program. Use the Edit Columns button to choose which data to show in the table.

heading: Site Launched
description: We launched OpenOUSD to bring more transparency to OUSD's central programs
